name: IFTTT Smart Home Integration
description: Connect StaticRebel nudges to smart home automation
setup_instructions: 1. Create a free IFTTT account at ifttt.com
6. Click 'Then That' and choose your smart home device
7. Configure the action (turn on lights, etc.)
8. Get your IFTTT webhook key from: https://ifttt.com/maker_webhooks
9. Replace YOUR_IFTTT_KEY in the webhook URL
10. Add webhook: sr webhook add --name "IFTTT Smart Home" --url "YOUR_WEBHOOK_URL" --event "nudge"
